attributes.action: MAKE POLICE PENSIONS COMPATIBLE WITH OLD AGE STATE PENSIONS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WHY ARE THE POLICE FAVOURED ? THEIR PENSIONS ARE AN EXTORTIONATE BURDEN ON NORMAL PEOPLE. THEY RETIRE AT AN EARLY AGE WITH FULL INFLATION PROOF PENSIONS. MOST POLICE OBTAIN FULL TIME JOBS AFTER LEAVING THE FORCE. THEIR PENSIONS ARE IMMORAL AND THEY CONTRIBUTE NOTHING TO THE ECONOMY.

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
